ResourceHeader.Description:
This data product contains a single pitch angle distribution per spin, 
                obtained by combining rebinned LEEA and HEEA data collected at various times 
                during one spin on the Cluster C2 spacecraft.

InformationURL.Name: ESA web page
InformationURL.Description: This site contains PEACE data documentation

InformationURL.Name: NSSDC Master Catalog listing for Cluster II Rumba Plasma Electron and Current Experiment (PEACE)
InformationURL.Description: This site provides information concerning the Cluster II Rumba Plasma Electron and Current Experiment Instrument.
